title: April 7, 2025
textContent:
---motmot the 13th---

Halaaaa 13th month na natinnn baka malas! Char! HAHAHAHAHA HAPPY MOTMOT BBY!!! first motmot of our 2nd year together! I appreciate you for coming kahit na alam kong busy lagi sched mo sa work pag mid shift kaaaa (kase sinasacrifice mo eep mo HAHAHAHAH MWAAA ABABAYU MY EEPY BUNION!)

Kakahatid lang namen kay itay niyan huhuhu. Ang lungkot parin talaga kahit ilang beses ng nangyayari ganun. The ride home never gets easier huhuhu. It always feels quieter and incomplete huhuhu. Ang lungkot talaga ng ganito huhuhu.

Kaya dapat bby pag tayo, we need to work hard and prepare hard rin para yung future family naten laging complete!!!!! Let's do our best to provide for Kaalia while still living together!! Ayaw ko mag OFW HUHUHUH gusto ko lang lumabas ng pinas para mag vacation AHAHAHHA.

MWAAA BBY! Happy Monthsary ulit!! I love you so much!!!
